text: I would like to start with the story of

not going to drop the right paper we're
going to take

she's waiting for this meeting because
this time she's carrying a small hidden
camera in her dress a camera that nobody
else can see nobody's allowed to film in
these meetings you risk your life if you
do Mary knows that but she also know
that the only way to stop them and to

expose their intimidation to make sure
they understand somebody is following
them to break the impunity they
feel Mary and her friends were filming
for months Undercover the intimidation
